alerts.issue_title: Approved Pre-authorization Not Reflected in Coverage
alerts.message: Despite an active policy, cashless coverage type, and an approved pre-authorization for ₹500,000.00 (which is greater than the total bill of ₹400,000.00), the 'Amount Covered by Insurance' is reported as ₹0.00. This indicates that the expected insurance coverage has not been applied to the bill, preventing a smooth discharge.
alerts.suggested_action: Contact Red Insurance immediately to ascertain why the approved pre-authorization has not resulted in coverage for the bill. Verify if all procedures billed align with the pre-authorized services and if any deductibles, co-pays, or non-covered services are impacting the claim.
evidence: Policy Status: active, Coverage Type: Cashless, Pre-authorization Status: approved (PA-2024-00231), Approved Amount: 500000.0, Total Hospital Bill: 400000.0, Amount Covered by Insurance: 0.0
